page.title: 18Manager:Rowntree Mackintosh
page.content: A survey was done in 1981 to ask women if they would like to work shifts.Very few wanted but would if their jobs depended on it.Two areas have ladies working a two shift system.In three shift areas like Kit Kat only men work as there is no exemption. {How do you find out what is happening {all over the factory? Simply by listening.We communicate with a briefing session every six weeks,we pass down information from the factory as a whole,then the departmental managers put in their information etc. For 20 mins every 6 weeks each employee is brought into a briefing group of 8-15 people. They are told by the supervisor how much the factory has sold,what overtime is available and any changes likely in the future. continued on page 19
